item.text: @#// 'bum ga pa bzhugs so//
@#// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ glegs bam gsum pa/ bam po dang po// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched
drug phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong ba nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid

la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye

mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa

nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug

thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog pa dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ba'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems

su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang

la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul

gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skyes mched drug pa

stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ba stong pa nyid kyang la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

par/ skye mched drug dngos po'i pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po'i pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la// stong pa nyid kyis

kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa phyi stong pa

zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa phyi

nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

par/ reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par// reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems

su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang

la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i

tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa mtha' las

'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan

pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par// reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom

sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid

kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i

tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa pa stong pa zhes bya

bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/

reg pa dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa ngo po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab

'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis

nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba phyi nang

stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/

tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba don dam stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed

do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang

la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i

tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong

pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid

kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar

yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

par/ tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid

kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis

dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang yid la bya ba par/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yid la bya ba par/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yid la bya ba par/ sred pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems

su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba bar/ sred pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar

yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldang pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred

ba thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dag tham pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba ba stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa chos thams cad stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed

do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis

nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/

rga shi dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya ba par/ rga shi rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis

kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong

pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes

bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/

rga shi dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang la/

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis

yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang la/ yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams

sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

par/ dbang po rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis dbang po de dag kyang la/ dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ stobs rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis stobs de dag kyang la/ stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang la/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

brgyad pa de dag gis rkyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden

pa de dag kyang la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/

pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan de dag kyang la/ bsam gtan de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshad pa

rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis tshad pa de dag kyang la/ tshad pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gzugs pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang la/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par thar pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa de dag kyang la/ rnam par thar pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang la/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa sgom ste/

pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa de dag kyang la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa de dag kyang la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang

rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang

la/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag

kyang la/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom ste/

pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la

bya ba par/ 'jigs pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis 'jigs pa de dag kyang la/ 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa de dag kyang la/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ snying rje chen po sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de yang la snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do// de

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang la/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sngang la skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sngang la skrag par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par

byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa par byed

cing zlog par byed pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslab par bya ba'i

cha'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la

bstan par bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can/

sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos pa par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi

pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan

yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa

dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab pa bstan pa dag ston to// 'grel to rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do//

yongs su ston to// zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag smra ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyang kyang / khyod ni phyir ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya

bar yang nus so// zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag smra ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu/ gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'du shes ni bdag gam bdag gis

stong ngo // 'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus ni bdag gam bdag

gis stong ngo // yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sgra ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // reg ni bdag gam bdag gis stong

ngo // chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa

ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus

te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag

gam bdag gis stong ngo // gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //

lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sa'i khams ni bdag gam

bdag gis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // me'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rlung gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i

khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ma rig pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dang gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // skye

mched drug ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // len pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // srid pa ni bdag gam

bdag gis stong ngo // skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rga shi ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag

gis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam

bdag gis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam

bdag gis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag

gam bdag gis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag

gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshad pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs med

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan

ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de

bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de ltar bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag

smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du

phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang // byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang do// nyan thos zhes bya ba

yang do// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng dag kyang stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'

dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang / nyan thos zhes bya ba yang do// zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog

cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag smra ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud

sdig to can dag mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog ste/ dran

pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 'phags

pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang / tshad pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /

rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/

nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag smra ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//

rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/

khyod la ci zhig bya de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad grangs par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo gcad pa tshad pas/ nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig/ ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag/ dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar pa'i tshul

gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang // dben zhes bya bar

pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba rtag ces bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba

dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes rtag ces bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /

stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du

byed sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam

par shes pa rtag ces bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du

dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi rnam pa dag smra ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs po rnams rigs par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub

sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni/ tshig gi don pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang

chub kyang ma skyes la/ sems can yang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor byang chub la yang tshig / sems can la yang tshig pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni/ tshig gi don pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub la ni skye ba'am/ yod pa nyid dam/ yod pa nye bar

so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ lam la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma

la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ smyig rgyu la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di ste dper na/ chu zla la gnas

do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgra brnyan la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yor la gnas do//

rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs brnyan la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la

gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper

na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ma nor bde bzhin nyid la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab

'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chos nyid la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i

tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chos kyi gnas nyid la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta

ste dper na/ chos skyon pa nyid la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bden pa nyid la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas do//

tshor ba la gnas do// 'du shes la gnas do// 'du byed la gnas med do// rnam par shes pa la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub

sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la gnas do// rna ba la gnas do// sna la gnas do// lce la gnas do// lus la gnas do// yid la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas do// sgra la gnas do// dri la gnas do//

ro la gnas do// reg la gnas do// chos la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/

sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gi rnam par shes pa la gnas do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas do// sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas do// lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas do// yid kyi rnam

par shes pa la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gi 'dus
te reg pa la gnas do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas do//

rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas/

do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas

'jug pa rnams la gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa la gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan

ma pa dang / smon pa pa de dag pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par shes pa de dag pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de dag pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de

bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi

gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag pa'i phyir

te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas kyi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigs pa de dag pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don

do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag pa'i phyir te/ rab

'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas kyi snying rje chen po la gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po de pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag pa'i phyir

te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa/

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas do// 'dus byas kyi khams la/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba pa la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems

dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa pa la gnas do// rab 'byor da de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don

do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa pa dang / rnam par byang ba pa la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don

do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab

'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'byung ba pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/

pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi skye ba

ma mchis pa la gnas ma ma mchis/ gang gi 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ gang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ gang gi mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ gang gi

'byung ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ gang gi pa la gnas ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas med do// gzugs 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do// gzugs kun

nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba pa la gnas do// gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do// gzugs 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do// gzugs pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor tshor ba skye ba

pa la gnas med do// tshor ba 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do// tshor ba kun nas nyon mongs pa pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do// tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do// tshor ba 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do//

tshor ba mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor 'du shes skye ba med pa la gnas med do// 'du shes 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do// 'du shes kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do// 'du shes

mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do// 'du shes 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do// 'du shes mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor 'du byed skye ba med pa la gnas med do// 'du byed 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do// 'du

byed kun nas nyon rmongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba pa la gnas do// 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do// 'du byed 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do// 'du byed mi pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor rnam

par shes pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do// rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do// rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do// rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba

med pa la gnas do// rnam par shes pa 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do// rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor mig skye ba med pa la gnas med do// mig 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do// mig kun

nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do// mig mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do// mig 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do// mig mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor rna ba skye ba med pa la

gnas med do// rna ba 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do// rna ba kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do// rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do// rna ba 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do// rna ba mi

pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba

med pa la gnas med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor

chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu spyod

ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'og la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub

sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems

dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshad snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i

tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ kun snang dag ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i

tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig

gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig

gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshad dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig

gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don

do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don

do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshad che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i

tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ldan
pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs pa/ bstan du pa/ thogs pa pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad kyi pa yang dag pa

nyid la bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni

ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / dge ba dang

lung du bstan pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba pa dang /

thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos de dag thams cad kyi pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos/ shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/

phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i

bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bu can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam

par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang /

'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge

'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/

de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni/ 'jig

rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor ma byin par len pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor du smra ba ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o//

rab 'byor phra ma ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// rab 'byor zhe gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor tshig kyal pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor chags sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor

gnod sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor log par lta ba ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang /

log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni

lung du ma bstan pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// gzugs pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o

phung po rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// khams rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos zhes bya'o//

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams brgyad dang / dge

ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par de ma yin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang

ji snyed yod pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa

nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang

rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa pa dang / ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtogs pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas

pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa cing dpyod pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad

gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// spug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni/ rnam par

thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha'

yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs

te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga ba'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o//

de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes 'du shes skye

mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta

ste/ de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa

dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar

bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa

btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang

sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas/ yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par

gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/

rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad

pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du

shes skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi

nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tham ba stong pa nyid

dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos

po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos

zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang /

khams brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma

mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa pa'i chos ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi

yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa

dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i

khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa/ 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang

pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa

nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

pa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba cing 'jig pa pa dang /

gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid/ chos kyi dbyings/ chos skyon pa nyid/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings

yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad

pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi

yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / ting nge

'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa pas chags par bya'o//

chos thams cad gnyis su pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa cing / rnam par rtog pa pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang

'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas

de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po

nges pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa

dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas/ phyir ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa

zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul du byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o// gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu par sems can thams

cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis

yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa pas/ chos thams cad skye ba pa dang / 'gag pa pa bdag gis shes par

bya'o// bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis chos kyi tshul

gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta
