bu ste/ de la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/

sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams

su myong bar bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos/ gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por/ sems can gang yang

phung po ma lus pa'i myang na las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang / bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o// zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sems can

thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o// de nas gzod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/

bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas/ byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bstsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis/ sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems

rlabs po che ni/ sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems mi skyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o// des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ mi sgul

ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems sgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o// des sems can thams cad kyi phul du pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems

bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su 'gyur ba pa ste/ rab 'byor

'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos/ rtag tu rgyun 'chad par chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la mos par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer pa ste/ 'di ni

chos zhes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o//

de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du blta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i

rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor

gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid

la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'du byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid

la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/

dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dran

pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la gnas/ stabs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas/ mthar

kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi

sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

ba brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal

gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i

ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge

'dzin la gnas/ rab tu bde bar gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bde bar 'jugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'khrul pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od zer

rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa med par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ brtson pa'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dpung rnam par dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar

'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshig la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyogs su rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'khor gsum

yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dbang po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la

gnas/ seng ge rnam par rkyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par glal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sne la zhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chags pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshol ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas la rten pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dri ma pa'i

sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba

byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ g.yo

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'jig pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mig yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ shes rab

sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge

'dzin la gnas/ sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams

cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin po che nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

'khrug pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dri ma med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge

mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gyur ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ming dang mtshan ma la

'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bya ba dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab rib pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge

'dzin la gnas/ g.yo ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges par gnas

pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mtha' yas sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas su bya ba pa'i ting

nge 'dzin la gnas/ gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa 'dor ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyod pa dam

pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad la chags pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

glog gi 'od zer bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgra dbyangs kyi

yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mngon par pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gzungs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mthun pa dang 'gal ba

pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyan chen po'i ting nge

'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdul cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la

gnas/ nyon mongs pa par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas su pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas

de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snod las rang 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes chen po'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ stobs bcu'i

'byung gnas su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgo rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ngag gi

skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa pas rnam par grol

zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug pa/

de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu don gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams

la chos ston pa dang / sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gso bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skyes bur lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shed can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shed bdag

tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byed pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byed du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor du 'jug

pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yod par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / par lta bar rab tu spang ba

dang / phung por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skye mched du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba rab tu

spang ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yang dag par spong bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dbang por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /

stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bsam gtan du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshad

med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid

dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta ba rab tu spang

ba dang / 'jigs par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /

sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba

rab tu spang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs

su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du shes su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta bar

'gyur ba yin/ snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ drir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ror lta bar 'gyur ba

yin/ reg tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar

'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'du te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar

'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te

reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg par rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nam mkha'i khams

su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dang gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye mched

drug tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sred par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ len par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rga shir lta bar

'gyur ba yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyis rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ stong

pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta

par 'gyur ba yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po pa stong po nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/

stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshad par lta

bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan

ma pa dang / smon pa med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi

'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byams pa chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ snying rje chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sems

can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dge 'dun du lta

bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su shing / pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshor bar shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'du shes su shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'du byed du

shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par shes par shing / pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tu shig pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rna bar shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// snar dmigs shing

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lcer dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lus su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sgrar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// drir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// ror dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// reg tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//

chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rna ba'i rnas par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

lta ba skyed do// lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba

skyed do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing /

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chu'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// me'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis lta ba skyed do// rlung gi khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// nam mkha'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//

ma rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dang gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// skye mched drug tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sred par dmigs

shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// len par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// srid par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// skye bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rga shir dmigs shing

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par

dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i

tshul gyi lta ba skyed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis lta ba skyed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis lta bskyed do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis lta ba skyed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mi pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis lta ba skyed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yang dag par spong bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dbang por

dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// byang chub kyi yan lag du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis lta bskyed do// 'phags pa'i bden par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// bsam gtan du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshad med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// gzugs med

pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par thar par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// mngon par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// ting nge 'dzin du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis lta ba skyed do// gzungs kyi sgor shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'jigs par shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// so so yang dag par

rig par shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// byams pa chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// snying rje chen por shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing

pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// byang chub tu shing dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis lta ba skyed do// sangs rgyas su dmigs shing pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// chos su shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dge 'dun du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dmigs

shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta

ba dang / 'du shes su lta ba dang / 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta ba dang / snar lta ba dang / lcer lta ba dang / lus su lta ba dang / yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir

gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta ba dang / drir lta ba dang / ror lta ba dang / reg tu lta ba dang / chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes

par lta ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes par lta ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang /

sna'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar

'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta ba dang / me'i khams su lta ba dang / rlung gi khams su lta ba dang / nam mkha'i khams su lta ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir ma

rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs su lta ba dang / skye mched drug tu lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang / tshor bar lta ba dang / sred par lta ba dang / len par lta ba dang / srid par lta ba dang /

skye bar lta ba dang / rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha

rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /

don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa

nyid du lta ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mi pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid du lta bar

'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang / dbang por lta ba dang / stobs su lta ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba dang / lam du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir

'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta ba dang / tshad par lta ba dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar par lta ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa

nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par lta ba dang // mngon par shes par lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'jigs par lta ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par

lta ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub

tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bde la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems

nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de

ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang /

rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /

'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba cing / 'gag pa pa dang / 'phel ba cing 'grib ba pa dang /

'ong ba cing 'bro ba pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa cing rnam par byang ba pa de la nyan thos kyi sems do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems do// tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa pa/ khongs su chud pa pa/ de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa do// zhes smras pa de ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas gzugs kyang chags pa do// tshor ba yang chags pa do// 'du

shes kyang chags pa do// 'du byed kyang chags pa do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// kyang chags pa do// rna ba yang chags pa do// sna yang chags pa do// lce yang chags pa do// lus kyang chags pa

do// yid kyang chags pa do// gzugs kyang chags pa do// sgra yang chags pa do// dri yang chags pa myid do// ro yang chags pa do// reg kyang chags pa do// chos kyang chags pa do// chos kyang chags pa do// gi rnam par shes pa

yang chags pa do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// yid kyi rnam par shes

pa yang chags pa do// 'dis te reg pa yang chags pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa

yang chags pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba yang chags pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa do// sa'i khams kyang chags pa

do// chu'i khams kyang chags pa do// khams kyang chags pa do// rlung gi khams kyang chags pa do// nam mkha'i khams kyang chags ba do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa do// ma rigs pa yang chags pa do//

'du byed kyang chags pa do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// dang gzugs kyang chags pa do// skye mched drug kyang chags pa do// reg pa yang chags pa do// tshor ba yang chags pa do// sred pa yang chags pa do//

len pa yang chags pa do// srid pa yang chags pa do// skye ba yang chags pa do// rga shi yang chags pa do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa do// bzod pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa yang chags pa do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa do// bsam gtan kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa do// nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// phyi stong

ba nyid kyang chags pa do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa

do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do//

chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// dngos po
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa do// dbang po rnams kyang chags pa do// stobs rnams

kyang chags pa do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chags pa do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang chags pa do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa do// bsam gtan rnams kyang chags pa do// tshang pa

rnams kyang chags pa do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chags pa do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma pa dang / smon par pa yang chags pa do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chags pa do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa do//

'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chags pa do// snying rje chen po yang chags pa do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyang chags pa do//

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chags pa do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chags pa do// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa do// tshor ba yang chags pa

do// 'du shes kyang chags pa do// 'du byed kyang chags pa do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// kyang chags pa do// rna ba yang chags pa do// sna yang chags pa do// lce yang chags pa do// lus kyang

chags pa do// yid kyang chags pa do// gzugs kyang chags pa do// sgra yang chags pa do// dri yang chags pa do// ro yang chags pa do// reg kyang chags pa do// chos kyang chags pa do// gi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
yang chags pa do// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang

chags pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags

pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa

do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa do// sa'i khams kyang chags pa do//

chu'i khams kyang chags pa do// khams kyang chags pa do// rlung gi khams kyang chags pa do// nam mkha'i khams kyang chags pa do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa do// ma rig pa yang chags pa do// 'du byed kyang

chags pa do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// dang gzugs kyang chags pa do// skye mched drug kyang chags pa do// reg pa yang chags pa do// tshor ba yang chags pa do// sred pa yang chags pa do// len pa yang chags

pa do// srid pa yang chags pa do// skye ba yang chags pa do// rga shi yang chags pa do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa do// tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa do//

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa do// nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// phyi nang stong pa nyid

kyang chags pa do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// thog ma dag tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med

do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags

pa do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa do// dbang po rnams kyang chags pa do// stobs rnams kyang chags

do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chags pa do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang chags pa do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa do// bsam gtan rnams kyang chags pa do// tshad pa rnams kyang chags pa

do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chags pa do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

pa dang / smyon pa pa yang chags pa do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chags pa do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa do//

'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chags pa do// snying rje chen po yang chags pa do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa med do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyang chags pa do//

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chags pa do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chags pa do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do zhes

smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rab 'byor kyis smras pa de yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing

khongs su chud pa do// nyan thos rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// tshor ba yang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'du shes kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rnam par shes

pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rna ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sna yang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lce yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lus kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// yid kyang rang bzhin stong

pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sgra yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// dri yang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// ro yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// reg kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// chos kyang

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// gi rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing

khongs su chud pa do// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag ba cing khongs su chud pa do// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lus kyi rnam par

shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa med do// lce'i

'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi

phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa cing khongs su chud pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud ba do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa cing khongs su chud pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su

chud pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do//

sa'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// chu'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su

chud pa do// rlung gi khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// nam mkha'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// ma rig pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rnam par shes pa yang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// dang gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// skye mched drug kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do//

reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sred pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chung pa do//

len pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// srid pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir// zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// skye ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su

chud pa do// rga shi yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su

chud pa do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir// zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// nang stong pa nyid

kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa

do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud

ba do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// dor ba pa

stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi

phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa

do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir

zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir// zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// dbang po rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// stobs

rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// bsam gtan rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag

pa cing khongs su chud pa do// tshad pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do//

rnam par thar pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khangs su chud pa do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong

pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// ting nge 'dzin rnams

kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su cung pa do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa

cing khongs su chud pa do// 'jigs pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa med do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chung pa do// snying

rje chen po yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud

pa do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa

cing khongs su chud pa med do// tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'du shes kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag

pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rnam pa shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rna ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sna yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lce yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lus kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// yid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sgra yang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir// zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// dri yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// ro yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// reg kyang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// chos kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// gi rnam pa shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir// zag pa cing khongs su chud pa

do// rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sna'i rnam pa shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lce'i rnam pa shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lus kyi rnam pa shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// yid kyi rnam pa shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do//

gi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// yid kyi 'dus

te reg pa yang // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i

tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa cing

khongs su chud pa do// sa'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// chu'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa

cing khongs su chud pa do// rlung gi khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// nam mkha'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rnam pa shes pa'i khams kyang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// ma rig pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rnam pa shes pa yang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// dang gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// skye mched drug kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// reg pa yang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// srid pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa myid do// len pa yang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// srid pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// skye ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rga shi yang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi

phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa

do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// stong ba nyid

stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs

su chud pa do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// thog ma dag tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing

khongs su chud pa do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cig khongs su chud pa do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// dmyig pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa

do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cig khangs su chud pa do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// yang dag par spong pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chung pa do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams byang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su

chud pa do// dbang po rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su

chud pa do// bsam gtan rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// tshad pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// 'jigs pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chung pa do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi

phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// snying rje chen po yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su cud pa do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do//

thams cad shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa cing khongs su chud pa do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ sems pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad do/

gzugs pa yang gzugs la chags pa do// tshor ba pa yang tshor ba la chags pa do// 'du shes pa yang 'du shes la chags pa do// 'du byed pa yang 'du byed la chags pa do// rnam par shes pa pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags
pa do// pa yang la chags pa do// rna ba pa yang rna ba la chags pa do// sna pa yang sna la chags pa do// lce pa yang lce la chags pa do// lus pa yang lus la chags pa do// yid pa yang yid la chags pa
do// gzugs pa yang gzugs la chags pa do// sgra pa yang sgra la chags pa do// dri pa yang dri la chags pa do// ro pa yang ro la chags pa do// reg pa yang reg la chags pa do// chos pa yang chos la

chags pa do// gi rnam par shes pa pa yang gi rnam par shes pa la chags pa do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa pa yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa do// sna'i rnam par shes pa pa yang sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa

do// lce'i rnam par shes pa pa yang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa do//

gi 'dus te reg pa pa yang gi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa

yang lca'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba

pa yang gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba

pa yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung 'bi tshor ba la chags pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa yang lus kyi 'dus te reg

pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa do// sa'i khams pa yang sa'i khams la chags pa do// chu'i khams pa yang chu'i khams

la chags pa do// khams pa yang khams la chags pa do// rlung gi khams pa yang rlung gi khams la chags pa do// nam mkha'i khams pa yang nam mkha'i khams la chags pa do// rnam par shes pa'i khams pa yang

rnam pa shes pa'i khams la chags pa do// ma rig pa pa yang ma rig pa la chags pa do// 'du byed pa yang 'du byed la chags pa do// rnam par shes pa pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa do// dang gzugs pa yang

dang gzugs la chags pa do// skye mched drug pa yang skye mched drug la chags pa do// reg pa pa yang reg pa la chags pa do// tshor ba pa yang tshor ba la chags pa do// sred pa pa yang srid pa la chags pa do//

len pa pa yang len pa la chags pa do// srid pa pa yang srid pa la chags pa do// skye ba pa yang skye ba la chags pa do// rga shi pa yang rga shi la chags pa do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa la chags pa do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// nang stong pa nyid

pa yang nang stong pa nyid la chags pa do// phyi stong pa nyid pa yang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa do// phyi nang stong pa nyid pa yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid pa yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa do//

chen po stong pa nyid pa yang chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa do// don dam pa stong pa nyid pa yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid pa yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa do// 'dus ma byas stong pa

nyid pa yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid pa yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid med pa yang thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la chags pa

do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid pa yang dor ba pa stong pa nyid la chags pa do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa

do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa do// pa stong pa nyid pa yang pa stong pa nyid la chags pa do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid pa yang dngos po pa stong pa

nyid la chags pa do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa la yang dngos po pa yang dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa do// dran pa nye bar gzhag

pa pa yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags pa do// yang dag par spong ba pa yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa do// dbang po pa yang

dbang po rnams la chags pa do// stobs pa yang stobs rnams la chags pa do// byang chub kyi yan lag pa yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa pa yang 'phags pa'i lam

yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa do// 'phags pa'i bden pa pa yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa do// bsam gtan pa yang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa do// tshad med pa pa yang tshad pa rnams la chags
pa do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa yang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa do// rnam par thar pa pa yang rnam par thar pa rnams la chags pa do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa pa yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa pa yang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa

dang / smon pa pa la chags pa do// mngon par shes pa pa yang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa do// ting nge 'dzin med pa yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags pa do// gzungs kyi sgo pa yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la

chags pa do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa do// 'jigs pa pa yang 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa do// so so yang dag par rig pa pa yang so so yang dag par

rig pa rnams la chags pa do// byams pa chen po pa yang byams pa chen po la chags pa do// snying rje chen po pa yang snying rje chen po la chags pa do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

rnams la chags pa med do// thams cad shes pa nyid med pa yang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid pa yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa yang

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs pa yang gzugs la chags pa do// tshor ba pa yang tshor ba la chags pa do// 'du shes pa yang 'du shes la
chags pa do// 'du byed pa yang 'du byed la chags pa do// rnam par shes pa pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa do// pa yang la chags pa do// rna ba pa yang rna ba la chags pa med do// sna pa
yang sna la chags pa do// lce pa yang lce la chags pa do// lus med pa yang lus la chags pa do// yid med pa yang yid la chags pa med do// gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa do// sgra pa yang sgra la
chags pa med do// dri pa yang dri la chags pa do// ro pa yang rol chags pa do// reg pa med pa yang reg pa la chags pa med do// chos pa yang chos la chags pa do// gi rnam par shes pa pa yang gi rnam

par shes pa la chags pa do// rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa pa yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa do// sna'i rnam par shes pa pa yang sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// lce'i rnam pa shes pa pa

yang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// gi 'dus te reg pa

pa yang gi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa la yang lce'i 'dus te

reg pa la chags pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do// gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa

yang gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba las chags pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa yang sna'i

'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byug ba'i tshor ba pa yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba la chags pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa yang lus kyi 'dus

te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa do// sa'i khams med pa yang sa'i khams la chags pa do// chu'i khams
pa yang chu'i khams la chags pa do// khams pa yang khams la chags pa do// rlung gi khams pa yang rlung gi khams la chags pa do// nam mkha'i khams pa yang nam mkha'i khams la chags pa med do// rnam

pa shes pa'i khams pa yang rnam pa shes pa'i khams la chags pa med do// ma rig pa med pa yang ma rig pa la chags pa do// 'du byed pa yang 'du byed la chags pa do// rnam pa shes pa pa yang rnam pa shes pa la chags pa

med do// dang gzugs med pa yang ming pa yang ming dang gzugs la chags pa do// skye mched drug pa yang skye mched drug la chags pa do// reg pa pa yang reg pa la chags pa do// tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa do//

sred pa pa yang sred pa la cags pa do// len pa med pa yang len pa la chags pa do// srid pa pa yang srid pa la chags pa do// skye ba pa yag skye ba la chags pa do// rga shi pa yang rga shi la chags pa myid do//

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa la chags pa do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// nang stong pa nyid med pa yang nang stong pa nyid la chags pa do// phyi stong pa nyid pa yang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa do// phyi nang stong pa nyid pa

yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa do// chen po stong pa nyid pa yang chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa do// don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa yang don dam pa stong pa
