nyid la chags pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa do// mtha' las 'das pa

stong pa nyid med pa yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa do// thog ma dang thams ma med pa stong pa nyid pa yang thog ma dang tham pa stong pa nyid la chags pa do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid med pa yang dor ba pa stong pa nyid la chags pa

do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

nyid la chags pa med do// pa stong pa nyid med pa yang mi pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid med pa yang dngos po pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

la chags pa med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags pa med do// yang dag

par spong ba med pa yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa med do// dbang po med pa yang dbang po rnams la chags pa med do// stobs med pa yang stobs

rnams la chags pa do// byang chub kyi yan lag pa yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa pa yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rnams la chags pa med do// 'phags pa'i bde

pa med pa yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do// bsam gtan med pa yang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa med do// tshad med pa med pa yang tshad med pa rnams la chags pa do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa yang

gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do// rnam par thar pa med pa yang rnam par thar pa rnams la chags pa med do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

rnams la chags pa med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la chags pa med do// mngon par shes pa med pa yang

mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa do// ting nge 'dzin med pa yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags pa med do// gzungs kyi sgo med pa yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i

stobs rnams la chags pa med do// 'jigs pa pa yang mi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa med do// so so yang dag par rig pa pa yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa do// byams pa chen po pa yang byams pa

chen po la chags pa do// snying rje chen po pa yang snying rje chen po la chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// thams cad shes pa nyid med pa yang

thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa

do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin

pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la pa pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba / mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams

gang gi bus// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po

khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la

yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang

po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i zhig gi don du

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

gnas shing / tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa

sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/

sems can thams cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can

thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan skyed do// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab sgom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can

'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams

cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar

bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa

nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems

can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs

par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams

cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dor ba pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la

sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mi pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//

sems can thams cad kyang pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis

kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang

dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya'o//

sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o//

sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams

cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa

rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang bsam gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang tshad

pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshad med pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o//

sems can thams cad kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam pa thar pa'i

sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams

la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o//

bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la sbyar

bar bya'o// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// zhes bya bar sems bskyed de// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang

thun mong du byas shing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa

yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson

'grus nyam par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing // de la pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi

go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ des sbyin pa yang mi / gtong

ba yang / len pa yang mi pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya

bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis la yang mos pa skyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa

dang mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/

nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul

khrims de yang mi shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su

'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la

bya bsam yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang

sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten

pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /

chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra

dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa

yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su

sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang /

rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid

la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / brtun mi ngas pa 'di ni/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma

yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang

sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can

thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan

pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing // chos thams cad la sgyu mar

byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin

pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sdo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs

rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te/

dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya

bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar byed mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o// tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar byed do//

bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te// bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad

pa dang // gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang

mi byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/

'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod

pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che

ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing

dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo

zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phral gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing

dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams

che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyi nad par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs

rjes su sgrog go/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams che

mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyi nad par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs

rjes su sgrog go/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi

khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyi nad par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa

mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing myid yongs su sgrog pa mdzad do/

'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos po 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa

mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che

ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs

rjes su sgrog go/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ steng

gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ smras pa/ tshe dang

ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin// gang pos smras pa/

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/

dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/

rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus

kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs

shing yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/

gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par

byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis

klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa

pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang

ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i

phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/

nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam pa shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha'

yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du
pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/

nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa 'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam pa ldang ba'i tshe yang /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog

pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa rtog pa dang / rnam pa dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi

rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran

pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la

nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan

bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi

dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/

ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen

po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par

bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/

shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par

'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam

mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam pa shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las
yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod de zhes pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la pa'i

tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa 'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di

dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam pa ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//

de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//

de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis

pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par

spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang
nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/
gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs
pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod
pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi/ dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i/ phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos
par byas shing / rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems/ rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su
rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi/ dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas/ gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu/ rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do// de
pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms

pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /

sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa

mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa 'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par

gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas

dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye

bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba

las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga'

ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran

pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms

pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/

gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//
de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas

pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs

pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//

de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye

mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang
dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa 'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam pa ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo

ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang

bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam pa rtog pa

pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas

te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/

sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems

rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs ba'i phyogs bcu

rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin

tu bsgoms pa/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos bar byas shing rnam pa spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad
pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing /
rnam par spyod do// de pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/

'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du

shes rnams nub bar gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye

mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma

yod do zhes chud zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//

'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa 'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang /

mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam pa ldang pa'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yogs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod

pas dben sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa

nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de dga' ba

las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i

bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran
pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs

pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis

pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing

rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis

klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/

gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod

do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye

mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams

cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes

'du shes skye mched la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa

'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings

kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa
pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do//

de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i

mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs

su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do// de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/

rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud

gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan

zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs

te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas

so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la

nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam pa shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam
shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes

skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/

nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la rjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang / de dag gi

skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag

gis/ bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam pa ldang yang 'di lta ste// nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi yang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi

'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang /

tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang /

mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson

'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam

gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gsum

pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes

'du shes skye mched de dag rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa pa'i rnam pa rab tu rtog kyang

bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag shing / de dag gis rlom sems pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra

dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa

thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams

cad du dbang po lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang /

rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam

pa thar pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa sgom pa dang / rnam pa

thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang /

rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams

cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

sgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par

gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do// snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do// dga'

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so// btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/

'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par

gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mnyams pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam pa spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan

thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa skyed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang skye zhing // de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi

'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/

bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/ de dag la rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /

stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon par yang 'jug par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes
kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid

shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis

ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong

pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ pa stong pa shes kyang pa'i tshul

gyis ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par

'khrug cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa 'jug/ rtag ces bya bar shes pa 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa 'jug/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa 'jug/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa 'jug/ bdag ces

bya bar shes pa 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa 'jug/ sdug ces bya bar shes pa 'jug pa dang / stong zhes bya bar shes pa 'jug stong zhes bya bar shes pa 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya bar shes pa 'jug mtshan ma ces bya bar

shes pa 'jug pa dang / smon pa yod ces bya bar shes pa 'jug smon pa ces bya bar shes pa 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa 'jug ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa 'jug da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par byed de/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus

pa'i tshul gyis 'di la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshed dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug pa byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs pa'i khams shes pa yang pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par byed

'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes pa yang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa pa dang /

'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des sbyin pa yang / sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' yang / len pa yang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des
tshul khrims kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' yang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul gyis

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas
kyang / des bzod pa yang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' yang mi / yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul

gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
par gnas kyang / des brtson 'grus kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi / byang chub sems dpa' yang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas byang / des bsam gtan yang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' yang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang te/ de ltar

na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge ba'i chos kyang shing / mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang /
zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang shing shes rab kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' yang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang te/ de
