ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/

bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis phyi

nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don

du de pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/ rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom rnam pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas

bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du/ de

pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong

pa nyid sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du

de mi pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid sgom

mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la

bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi

pa'i tshul gyis dngos po po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres

pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de pa'i tshul

gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de pa'i tshul gyis dang po lnga sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par

bsgom pa'i don du/ de pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems kyi yan lag

bdun sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhin sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de

pa'i tshul gyis tshad pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi

sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du// de mi pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya

ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom

pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de

pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas

bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de

pa'i tshul gyis 'jigs pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du/ de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam

pa bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas

zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya
par shes so// gzugs su pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// 'du shes su pa'i phyir/ 'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni/
tsam du zad do// 'du byed su pa'i phyir 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// su pa'i phyir/
ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rna ba su pa'i phyir/ rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sna su pa'i phyir/ sna zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lce su pa'i phyir lce zhes bya ba
'di ni tsam du zad do// lus su pa'i phyir/ lus zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// yid su pa'i phyir// yid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gzugs su pa'i phyir/

gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sgra su pa'i phyir/ sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dri su pa'i phyir/ dri zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// ro su pa'i phyir/ ro zhes bya ba 'di ni
tsam du zad do// reg su pa'i phyir/ reg ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chos su med pa'i phyir/ chos zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gi rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ gi rnam par
shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sna'i rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ sna'i rnam par

shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lce'i rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba
'di ni tsam du zad do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gi 'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni
tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam

du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// yid kyi

'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du

zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus

te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa

las byung pa'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sa'i khams su pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chu'i khams su pa'i phyir/ chu'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do//
khams su pa'i phyir/ khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rlung gi khams su pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// nam mkha'i khams su pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'i
khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa'i khams su pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// ma rig pa su pa'i phyir/ ma rig pa zhes bya
ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// 'du byed su pa'i phyir/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dang gzugs su

pa'i phyir/ dang gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// skye mched drug su pa'i phyir/ skye mched drug ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// reg pa su pa'i phyir/ reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do//

tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sred pa su pa'i phyir/ sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// len pa su pa'i phyir/ len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// srid

pa su pa'i phyir/ srid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// skye ba su pa'i phyir/ skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rga shi su pa'i phyir/ rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sbyin pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do//

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di

ni tsam du zad do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya

pa 'di ni tsam du zad do// nang stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// phyi stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid

su pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chen po stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ chen

po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// don dam pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid

su med pa'i phyir/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid su

pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// pa stong
pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// ngo bo nyid

su pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dran pa

nye bar gzhag pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams su pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rdzu

'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dbang po rnams su pa'i phyir/ dbang po lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// stobs rnams su
pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lam su pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// bsam gtan rnams su
pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// tshad pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ tshad pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su pa'i phyir/

gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rnam par thar pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

rnams su pa'i phyir/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa su pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar

pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// mngon par shes pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// ting nge 'dzin rnams

su pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams su pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su pa'i phyir/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// 'jigs pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su pa'i

phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// snying rje chen po su pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su
pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// de bzhin nyid su pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid su

pa'i phyir/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid su pa'i phyir/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chos nyed su pa'i phyir/ chos

nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chos kyi dbyings su pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chos kyi gnas nyid su pa'i phyir/ chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do//
chos skyon pa su pa'i phyir/ chos skyon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i mtha' su pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// byang chub su

pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas su pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po dgu pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu

gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smyin par byed do// sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing

nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing

du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang 'byung ngo // de

gnyis su pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin te// de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/ theg pa

de dang nam du yang 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /

ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dang ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// de bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi

'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen

po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog

cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mos zhig tu/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo

skor ba byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing

'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes/ grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa

'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten

gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na

pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su

rjod pa mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo

skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa

mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i

klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg

pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi

'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/

bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su

rjod pa mdzad do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba

byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di

skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so// go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa

dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong

pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chos thams cad stong

nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha

bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/ dbang po'i go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos/ lam gyi go

cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi go cha bgos/ tshad pa'i go cha bgos/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos/ ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos/ gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go

cha bgos/ 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i

go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho phyogs kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas

par 'gengs so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//

lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do//

shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab

tu skyod do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye

ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// des stong gsum

gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i

sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo //

de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

'di na/ byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal

lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ byol song gi skye gnas de dag gnas rnam par ldang ngo //

de dag byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/

gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod

do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag gshin rje'i

par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis

lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sems can de dag la

sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog/ chos kyi sgra sgrog/ dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par gyur la/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i

'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ci snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig

rten de nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams

tshad grangs pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin

pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar bai DuR+Ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid

mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// skom 'dod pa rnams la skom gyi sbyin pa byed do// bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa'i sbyin pa byed do// gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi sbyin pa byed do//

me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog gi sbyin pa byed do// phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed do// spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin pa byed do// byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa'i sbyin pa byed do// mal cha 'dod pa rnams

la mal cha'i sbyin pa byed do// khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do// 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do// yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod

pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi

ru dang / gser/ dngul gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa

la gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa la me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa la spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa la khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa la 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad

'dod pa la yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DuR+Ya dang / dung dang /

man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang

chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i

mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni

bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal

cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung

dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la ci snyam du sems

sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod

pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba

'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai D+'uR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru

dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai D+'uR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / ched du bsam te skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi

lam la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa

bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /

mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang

dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos

bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs

zhig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang

dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa

dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /

mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems

can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba

bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa

pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa

bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de

bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /

mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs

kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa do//

rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas

shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la

rdo dang / dbyig pas rdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par bya'o zhes go cha bgo ba byed cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god pa byed do// rab 'byor 'di

lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la

sbyor ba dang / rab tu 'god par byas na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de

ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go

cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go

'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe

na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di

lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod

na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa

do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang 'khrug pa'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang 'god par byas te/ de ltar yang dag par skul ba rnams kyang / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol

tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs

shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam//

gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod

kyang / sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag

par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang /

gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshu rol

tam/ pha rol tu te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul

zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par

sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul te bzhag cing bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa

bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes

bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi

khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/

sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can

ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed

cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/

sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems

can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
