rab tu bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing bsod nams kyi tshogs kun 'dzin cing chud za bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni rab tu bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bde bar 'dzugs pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po thams cad bde bar 'jog cing 'dzugs pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bde bar 'dzugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'khrul pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing snyoms par 'jug pa thams

cad kyi spyod yul dang / spyod pa thams cad rjes su dran zhing nyams pa par byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'khrul pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas

shing ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od gzer gyis sems can gyi khams snang bar byed cing / sngon gyi spyod pa rjes su dran par byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la brtson pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi brtson pa'i mthu skyed par byed pa ste/ 'di ni brtson pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting

nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'di ni dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'phags

par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nges pa'i tshig la gdon za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug

pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i tshig la gdon za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la tshig la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshig la 'jug pa ste/ 'di

ni tshig la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyogs rnam par lta ba ste/ 'di ni phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nyam

pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyam par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyam pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du zhing khongs su chud par 'dong ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rgyal po'i

phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / don thams cad nges par sgrub pa la ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgyas 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa lta bu ste/ 'di ni rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nam mkha'

rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang

zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad ting nge 'dzin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul du 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ de la rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ji ltar rgyal mtshan dam pa bzhin ting nge 'dzin thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa ste/ 'di ni rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dbang dam pa nges par thob pa ste/ 'di ni dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas

shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rjes su phyin ci ma log par yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ 'di ni rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / rdul dang dri ma thams cad

rab tu spangs pa'i dbang du gyur cing / ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du dbang dam pa thob pas bsgyings pa lta bu ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la seng ge rnam par rkyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de

la gnas shing cho 'phrul dam pa'i dbang thob pas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba cing / bdud thams cad kyi dpung 'jig cing 'dzul bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par rkyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la seng ge rnam par glal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing spobs pa dam pa dang ldan pas 'khor mang po'i nang du bag tsha ba par/ mu stegs can log par lta ba thams cad 'dul ba ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par glal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la snrel zhi

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'khor ba'i chos rnams rgyun nges par gcod par byed pa ste/ 'di ni snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chags pa dang thogs pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge

'dzin de la gnas shing chos thams cad la 'dzin pa dang thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ni chags pa dang thogs pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs

pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu sel ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam

par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la tshol ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang tshol ba pa ste/ 'di ni tshol ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gnas la rten pa

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang gnas la rten par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gnas la rten pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sems pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/

ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems kyang 'byung sems las byung ba rnams kyang rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni sems pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la bdud bzhi 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing bdud bzhi'i

dgra thams cad 'dul bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni bdud bzhi 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dri ma pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma par byed pa ste/

'di ni dri ma pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'od mtha' yas par byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od

byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu

ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dag pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa ste/

'di ni dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od dri ma pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba ste/ 'di ni 'od dri ma pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dga' ba byed pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zad shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad shes pa dang / zad shes pa yang dag

par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ de la 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rab tu thob pa ste/ 'di ni 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to/ de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zad pa

dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad shes par rjes su mthong nas/ rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de ltar mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin to// de la g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad g.yo 'gul rab tu 'byed/ rlom sems su byed pa ste/ 'di ni g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing mnyam par gzhag pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'jig pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'jig pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/

'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zla ba dri ma pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mun pa par byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la shes rab sgron

ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / lnga yongs su dag par byed pa ste/ 'di ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams

cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba dang /

zla ba bzhin du gyur pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to// de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/

ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dpal yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin

thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mthong bar khong du chud par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na/ sems g.yo rnam

par g.yo rnam par ldog/ yongs su yi 'chad par 'gyur/ nyams su bde ba la/ de la sems zhes bya ba ni 'di yin zhes bya bar sems 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la kun tu snang ba zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / thams cad snang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas

shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin chen mtha' ltar kun nas

snang ba ste/ 'di ni rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgya pa'i mthas/ phyag rgyas btab pa nye bar bzung bas phyag

rgyas btab par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang mnyam pa nyid du ma chud pa par

yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi dga' ba spong ba ste/ 'di ni

dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni

chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'phags shing yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ 'di ni chos kyis

'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rin po che nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing yon tan rin po ce chen po mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi 'byung khung du gyur pa ste/ 'di ni rin po ce nyid ces bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing 'jig rten gyi rtsod pa dang 'khrug pa rnam pa sna tshogs spong ba ste/ 'di ni 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad rnam par 'thor ba ste/ 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la

gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos rnams kyi mnyam pa

nyid nges par 'tho pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dri ma par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing spyod pa mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa skyed pa ste/ 'di ni dri ma par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin to// de la yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yi ge dang bral ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang pa pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin

de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi pa/ 'chad par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'gyur ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad 'gyur ba

pa ste/ 'di ni 'gyur ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi rnam pa tsam yang pa pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin to/ de la dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs par byed pa ste/ 'di ni dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to// de la bya ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / bya ba thams cad kun spong pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nges pa'i la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni yang dag par su cing tha snyad la ltos pa tsam mo zhes rtog pa 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gnas par spyod pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gnas pa pa ste/ 'di ni gnas par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rab rib pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin

de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba ste/ 'di ni rab rib pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa yang

dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la g.yo ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad g.yo ba par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba

ste/ 'di ni g.yo ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to// de la yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gyi tshogs rjes su 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi

tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sems par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni sems par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de

la nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin de dag la sems nges par gnas kyang / de'i mtshan nyid su par rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la

dge ba'i tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin to// de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//

de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spobs pa mtha' yas pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la mtha' yas

sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ji ltar sgron ma gsal bas chos thams cad rab tu snang bar byed pa lta bu ste/ 'di ni mtha' yas sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ de la mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting

nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe

na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la

gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad la nem nur rnam par sel ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gnas su bya ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la

gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi gnas yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gnas su bya ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

chos gang yang gnyis su yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang / ting

nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin

thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam par 'dor ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad gnyis su

par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa 'dor ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la spyod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing snyoms par 'jug pa de dag las spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston kyang gang la yang

'dzin pa pa ste/ 'di ni spyod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la zhugs nas/

de la zhugs pa'i phyir khong du chud pa gang yang pa ste/ 'di ni rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi

brda dang sgra la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rin chen snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing 'gyur ba dang 'jigs pa cing yon tan dpag tu pa dang ldan pa'i rin po ce rgyu dam pa sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni

rin snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad la chags pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos gang la yang chags pa pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams

cad la chags pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la log gi 'od gzer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyed pas mun pa mun gnag sel ba dang / gzhan yang yon tan mtha'

yas pa brgya 'god pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi 'od gzer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags mtha' yas pa spong ba ste/ 'di ni spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin to// de la chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ye shes sgron

ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos rnams kyi chos dang / gang zag la bdag pa gsal bar ston pa ste/ 'di ni ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la phyir ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / bsam gyis khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul phyir ldog pa gzhan gyis thub pa dam pa sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni phyir ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral

ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yi ge dang bral bar rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang

zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzi brjid kyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de

la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la mngon par pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par pa par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mngon par pa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin

de la gnas shing / chos thams cad la ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams

cad rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gzungs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya kun 'dzin

pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang

dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zad shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad par rung

bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / gzungs thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs kyi blo gros

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag pa dang / log par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa

dang / log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa

yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la mthun pa dang 'gal ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin

thams cad la mthun pa dang 'gal ba yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mthun pa dang 'gal ba pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od dri ma pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil

'khor pa ste 'di ni 'od dri ma pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni snying po dang ldan pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zla ba dri ma par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni zla ba

dri ma par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / dag cing gsal ba'i 'od kyis sems can gyi ris snang bar byas shing mun pa mun nag dang tsha ba'i gdung ba sel bar byed pa

ste/ 'di ni glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyan chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de

la rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'jig rten thams

cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skyob pa ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting

nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'khrug pa yang rtse gcig kyang pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rdul cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/

ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad rdul can dang rdul dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni rdul cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nyon mongs pa par yang dag

par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyon mongs pa par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams

cad nyon mongs pa par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa par yang dag par gzhol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa

thams cad nyon mongs pa par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gnas su pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar pa

ste/ 'di ni gnas su pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir ldog

pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / mnyam par gzhag pa'i mthus yon tan mang po skyed de ji

ltar lha dag bsod nams kyi mthus kha zas dag snod las rang 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta bu ste/ 'di ni snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi thab ma lus par sreg pa ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ye shes chen po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ye shes kyi 'od kyis thams cad snang

bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni ye shes chen po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa

ste/ 'di ni stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don du dam pa'i chos kyi sgo phye bas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal

chen po las myur du sgrol ba ste/ 'di ni sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus pa ste/ 'di ni

lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las pa ste/

'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las pa ste/ 'di ni ngag gi skyon

yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yid kyi las pa ste/ 'di ni yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to// de la kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi dbang po'i bye brag la kun tu rtog cing grol bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nam mkha' lta bu'i

ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin sems can rnams la snyoms par phan 'dogs pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa pa 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u brgyad do// //

rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /

chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes

bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par rtog go// phyi'i lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /

brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par rtog go// phyi nang gi lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus

kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par rtog go// nang gi tshor

ba la de pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa

rnams la rnam par rtog go// phyi'i tshor ba la de pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod

kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par rtog go// phyi nang gi tshor ba la de pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid

bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par rtog go/ nang gi sems la de pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig

rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par rtog go/ phyi'i sems la de pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang

ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par rtog go/ phyi nang gi sems la de pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes

su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par rtog go/ nang gi chos la de

pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam

par rtog go// phyi'i chos la de pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang chos dang

ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par rtog go/ phyi nang gi chos la de pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par

bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par rtog go// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rab

'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gron 'gro'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de'i lus nyams bde ba'am

nyams bde yang rung ste/ ji lta ji ltar gnas pa/ de lta de ltar des rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa

dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod de/ de 'gro'am

'ong yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ lta'am rnam par lta yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ bskum ma ma brkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ sbyar ma dang lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ zos pa dang 'chos pa dang 'thungs pa dang / myangs

pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nyal ba dang gnyid kyis mya myo bstsal ba la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'greng ba dang 'dug pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ gnyid kyis log gam ma log na yang

shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ smra ba dang smra na yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tshe/ nang gi lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu na yang / dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na yang / dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs nang du ring du rgyun yang

dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na yang / dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu na yang / dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs phyir thung ngu rgyu na yang / phyir

dbugs thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo skor ba'am/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo skor ba'i mchan bu mkhas pa ni/ ring du skor na ring du skor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thung ngu skor na thung ngu skor ro zhes

bya bar rab tu shes so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran par dbugs nang du rgyus na yang / dran par dbugs nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dran par dbugs

phyir rgyus na yang dran par dbugs phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs ring du nang du rgyus na yang / dbugs ring du nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs ring du phyir rgyus na yang / dbugs ring du phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu

shes so// dbugs thung ngu nang du rgyus na yang / dbugs thung ngu nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbugs thung ngu phyir rgyus na yang / dbugs thung ngu phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde

ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do// chu'i khams dang / khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes

bya bar khams kyi rnam par yang dag ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ba lang gi shen pa'am/ ba lang gi shen pa'i mchan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon po thogs te/ ba lang bsad cing bag bzhir gshags te/ de ltar so sor phye nas/

'greng ngam 'dug ste/ de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang / lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do// chu'i khams dang / khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do

zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'greng ngam 'dug ste/ nang gi lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus

kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/ skra dang man chad du/ sen mo dang / spu dang pags pa yan chad du gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang

sen mo dang / bags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang chub dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang mkhal ma dang mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang /

rngul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / dang / glad rgyas dang / rngu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do// zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ rab

'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chun pa'i sgye snod til dang / yungs kar dang / sran chung dang / bal sran dang / nas dang / gro dang / 'bras dang / 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba dang ldan pa'i zhig gis phye ste/ bltas na/ 'di ni til lo// 'di ni yungs kar ro//

'di ni sran chung ngo // 'di ni bal sran no// 'di ni nas so// 'di ni gro'o// 'di ni 'bras so// 'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil

yan chad/ skra dang spyi bo man chad sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad du gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus

pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rngul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang /

bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / dang / glad rgyas dang / rngu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/

rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan

pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs/

dur khrod du bor ba/ ro'i mal du bsnyal ba/ shi nas zhag gcig lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag gsum lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag lnga lon pa'am/ rnam par bam pa'am/ rnam par sngos pa'am/ rnam par

rnags pa'am/ rnam par zos pa'am/ rnam par 'thor ba mthong na/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can no// 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o// zhes bya bar nye bar sbyor ro// rab 'byor de

ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems

dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro/ shi nas zhag drug lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag bdun lon

pa/ bya rog gam/ khwa'am/ 'ol pa'am/ bya rgod dam/ spyang ki'am/ wa'am khyi'am/ de ma yin pa'i srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs kyis bza' ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang de lta bu'i chos can/

de lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid de lta bu las ma 'das so// zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /

brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro rnam par zos pa/ gtsang ba rnags pa/ sungs pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang / 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye

bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/

'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa/ keng rus shar ri dang / khrag ra ri

chags pa/ rgyus pas brang breng du 'brel ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o// zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de

ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags

sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus sha dang khrag pa/ rgyus pa'i

gzungs pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab

'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig

rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus gzungs

pa gyes pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa/ sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das

pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin

dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur

khrod kyi rus pas la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rnam par 'thor ba/ rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ byin pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ brla'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ dpyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ tshigs pa'i

rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ mjing pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ mgo'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor ba mthong na/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos

can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de pa'i tshul gyis

lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa/ rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa/ dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta

bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus

kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma khon pa rab rib snang ba/ sngon por gyur pa thi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa/ zegs pa brul ba sa'i rdul dang 'gran 'gran du gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang

de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can no// 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// phyi'i lus la de

pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// phyi nang gi lus la de pa'i tshul gyis lus

kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// nang gi tshor ba la de pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /

brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// phyi'i tshor ba la de pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can

shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// phyi nang gi tshor ba la de pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin

dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// nang gi sems la de pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig

rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// phyi'i sems la de pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang

yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// phyi nang gi sems la de pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par

bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// nang gi chos la de pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do//

phyi'i chos la de pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// phyi nang gi chos la de

pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sdig to dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa'i rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ de pa'i tshul gyis mos bskyed cing rtsol lo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mthu skyed do// yang

dag par smon lam 'debs so// sdig to dge ba'i chos skyes pa'i rnams spangs pa'i phyir de pa'i tshul gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mthu skyed do// yang dag par smon lam 'debs so// dge

ba'i chos ma skyes pa'i rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ de pa'i tshul gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mthu skyed do// yang dag par smon lam 'debs so// dge ba'i chos skyes pa'i rnams gnas pa dang / phyir zhing bsgom

pa dang / nyams par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de pa'i tshul gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo// brtson 'grus brtsom mo// sems kyi mthu skyed do// yang dag par smon lam 'debs te/ rab 'byor 'di yang

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su

grub pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo// sems kyi ting

nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo// dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen

po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar dbang po lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes

rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar stobs lnga ste/

lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ rab 'byor 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dag pa chen po'o//

rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dgra byang chub kyi yan lag

dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan

lag go// de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas

pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam

par spong bas yongs su grub pa de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// de la brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe

brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// de la dga' ba yang dag byang

chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/

'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// de la shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa

byed do// de la ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod

chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// de la btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de pa'i

tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

brgyad pa ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag

pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod

chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do//

yang dag pa'i ngag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i ngag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/

rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ yang

dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ rab

'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs

su grub pa/ de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dben pa la

gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang

dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la

gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed de/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma par rtog pa'i tshe/ sems

gnas pa mtshan ma pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba do// zhes mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa

smon pa pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo de dag la zhum pa par dran par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar ye shes bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa

dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o// de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal

skye bar shes pa'o// de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang bar shes pa'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog par shes pa'o// de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o// de

la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad par shes pa'o// de la skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i rgyud skye ba par shes pa'o// de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs su rtogs shing

shes pa'o// de la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/ rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang

yid rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / gzugs rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sgra rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / dri rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ro rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chos rtag

ces bya bar shes pa dang / gi khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / gzugs kyi khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sgra'i

khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / dri'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes

pa dang / lce'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ro'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus kyi khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg bya'i khams rtag ces bya

bar shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / yid kyi khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chos kyi khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /

sa'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chu'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rlung gi khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rnam par

shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ma rig pa rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / 'du byed rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / dang gzugs rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / skye mched

drug rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg pa rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / tshor ba rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sred pa rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / len pa rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / srid pa rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /

skye ba rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rga shi rtag ces bya bar shes pa'o// de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis shes pa'o// de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang

gis lam shes pa dang / yongs su byang ba shes pa'o// de la sgra ci bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ rab 'byor 'di yang pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen

po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar dbang po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i

dbang po dang / yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o// de la yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang

po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yongs su snang bar ma gyur pa 'di ni yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o// de la yongs su shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob

pa yongs su shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o// de la yongs su shes pas

rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge

'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan

yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa cing

dpyod pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/

dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rtog pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin

gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar te/ 'di ni rtog pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la rtog pa cing dpyod pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa

dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes 'du shes

skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// 'di ni rtag dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /

chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /

lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di

lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba

can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa pa dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i

dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la

dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid bde ba snga nas

kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang sdug bsngal yang pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi'o// de la tshad pa bzhi gang zhe na

'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa

yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu

yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste
mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig

rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad
pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas

shing pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod de/ de dag ni tshad pa bzhi'o// de la gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tshe/ rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched

la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa

thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das

te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dag ni gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o// de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par

thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du

shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa

thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang
