pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ yid

kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang

yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa
de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu lnga pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
sa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
sngon gyi mthar so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// sa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// sa'i
khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang
chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi so// sa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sa'i khams dben pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/

sa'i khams pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/

sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sa'i khams pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa

dang / sa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir
byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
sngon gyi mthar so// chu'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chu'i khams
pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
dbus su so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chu'i khams pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid dang /
chu'i khams dben pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/ chu'i khams pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
yin/ chu'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/

dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chu'i khams pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo

nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do//
tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sdon gyi mthar so//
khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// me'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' dbus su so// khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ khams pa dang / khams stong pa nyid dang / khams dben pa dang / khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha'
/ dbus te/ khams pa yang gzhan ma yin/ khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ khams ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/

byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ khams pa gang
yin pa dang / khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / khams ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi

mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rlung gi khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rlung gi khams ngo bo
nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rlung gi khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang
chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su

so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid dang / rlung gi khams dben pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha'
phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ rlung gi khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid pa

yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rlung gi

khams pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon

gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// nam mkha'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
ma'i mthar so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
phyi ma'i mthar so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// nam mkha'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// nam mkha'i
khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang /
nam mkha'i khams dben pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ nam mkha'i khams pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nam
mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi

mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ nam mkha'i khams pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa

nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so//
rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam
par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par shes pa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par shes
pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par shes pa'i
khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par shes pa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rnam par shes pa'i
khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rnam par shes pa'i khams
ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa
nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus mi te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams pa yang
gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems

dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams pa gang yin pa dang

rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi

mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ma rig pa

ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ma rig pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ma rig pa pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid

pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang / ma rig pa dben pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon
gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/ ma rig pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid pa yang

gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ ma rig pa pa

gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi
ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'du byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'du
byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'du byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
dbus su so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha'
/ phyi ma'i mtha'i / dbus te/ 'du byed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan

ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ 'du byed pa gang yin pa dang /

'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par shes pa stong
pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang
chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par
shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' dbus su so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa pa dang / rnam
par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ rnam par shes pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam

par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi

ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa gang

yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de
gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang gzugs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
so// dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dang gzugs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so//
dang gzugs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub

pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong

pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'

yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi

ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
mthar so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

sngon gyi mthar so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rang gi mtshan nyid

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid

pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
nyid dben pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/

sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /

phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
so// pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// mi pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// pa stong
pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang
chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
so// pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ pa stong pa nyid pa dang / pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' /
phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ pa stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/

pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na pa stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / mi pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa

gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang
ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
mthar so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa stong
pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang

chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid
med pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus

te/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid

pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dngos po

pa stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang

chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang

chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi

ma'i mthar so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la

sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma

yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems

dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa'i
phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo

bo nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan

ma yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi

mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
